channel.title: Journals on Satrio Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Journals on Satrio Blog

item.title: Design System
item.description: Design Sytems What’s a design system? In my words, it is a set of components and resuable code that team’s use to establish a brand identity and allow for more consistency and efficentcy for teams to build out pages, apps etc. I found that the company I work for is growing through some major growing pains and I am super happy to be apart of the growth. I have a chance everyday to make a big difference in our success.

item.title: Conference Trip SF 2019
item.description: Smashing Conference 2019 Trip to SF I have returned from the Smashing Conference in the beautiful San Francisco, CA. Bay area in the house. I want to write down some of the experiences and highlights I gathered from this great experience. It was a two-day gathering of some of the best minds in Front End/UX Design. Being a Front End Dev, myself, this was a perfect way to get out to the Bay and learn from the best in the biz.

item.title: Portfolio 2.0
item.description: Welcome to my Newest Portfolio! I have finally finished my rebranded portfolio. I decided to rebrand myself and take everything I have learned over the last year and apply it here. I did a lot of studying on UI/UX Design over the last year. Sadly more than actual coding. I still code on a daily basis at my real job but not enough JavaScript as I’d like. I think it would be super beneficial for me, where I’m at right now to learn the best design practices.

item.title: Javascript30
item.description: Hey to all! Hopefully I’m starting to generate some people to this blog. I’m making it a goal to continue to write and post helpful tips as I learn and grow as a Dev. I’ve been working really hard on my Design skills. It was serisouly needed. Color Theory, Typography, the new trends etc. With that being said, I am starting Wes Bos’ JavaScript30 course which is 30 days of straight JS with daily challenges and tuts.

item.title: Graphic
item.description: Check out my new graphic for when I stream my favorite game Overwatch! Done in Adobe Spark & with Photoshop, I used a deviant Art, slapped on a filter, added a clean two clean fonts, and cropped in my photo. I will be using it to blast out on Social Media when I play as my favorite character Sombra

item.title: New Portfolio
item.description: Welcome to my new Portfolio! I’m excited to have built out this beautiful site from complete scratch. Literally. Started it about 5 months from this post date and chipped away at it day by day. The main purpose is to showcase how much I have improved since I landed my first ever Front End gig full time. I will for sure post more this time, whether it be trips I go on or concerts I go to.

item.title: Cards Design
item.description: #success-box { background: linear-gradient( 135deg, #81FBB8 10%, #28C76F 100%); } #error-box { background-image: linear-gradient( 135deg, #FF9D6C 10%, #BB4E75 100%); } #cat-box { background-image: linear-gradient( 135deg, #EE9AE5 10%, #5961F9 100%); } .cat-text { color: #5961F9; } .card-box { border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: 5px 5px 20px #cbcdd3; perspective: 40px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-content: center; align-items: center; text-align: center; padding: 40px 20px; } #card-container { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr)); grid-gap: 40px; max-width: 800px; margin: 60px auto; padding-left: 15px; padding-right: 15px; } .
